game.name: SELINI
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A wordless journey of foggy wastelands, abandoned machinery and robot kinship. Explore and uncover meaning without guidance or dialogue.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A wordless journey of foggy wastelands, abandoned machinery and robot kinship. Explore and uncover meaning without guidance or dialogue.
